siteMetadata.title: Cooking In Pajamas
siteMetadata.description: Stories and Musings from Wayfaring Adventurers and Aspiring Home Cooks.

node.title: This post has puppies and bunnies!
node.plaintext:
Sumu and I are swamped. The sort of swamped where we totally forget about our
posts for weeks on end, because EVERYTHING ELSE IN OUR LIVES got us like



Look, we love you guys, but life has just gotten the better of us. Accept our
humblest apologies with the knowledge that we'll be back in a short week with
MULTIPLE posts.

Until we're back, please enjoy this sweet sweet puppy.
